definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="68" w="294">This example will test if the current entity type is the player. If it is true, then it will run whatever you place in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntitySkeleton</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="number_variable"><field name="variable">skeletonswitchup</field><field name="config">BetterConfig</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="86" w="233">This example will test if the entity is holding a specific item. If it is true, then it will give the entity a level 2 status effect of speed for 3 seconds.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.BOW</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_mainhand_item"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.IRON_SWORD</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_set_mainhand_item"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.IRON_AXE</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">200</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_set_mainhand_item"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.BOW</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
